text:
Hello Everyone,
I am using HubSpot from last 2 month's. Want to learn more about that how we can create custom theme and custom module
Hi folks! I'm Gary at Founders Network. Been using HubSpot for about a year. New to this community. Mainly here for API-related stuff.
Hi! Anyone know how to delete a theme?
No help articles on it, cannot do it through settings --> themes, cannot do it though design tools...
Delete the fields.json file and theme theme file
hm
if I right-click it, nothing happens
Actions drop-down is disabled

What happened was that as one is unable to modify the code of a theme, one needs to make a clone. So I did and modified one .HTML template page. However, after I create a new web page based on the cloned theme, it still seems to resort to using the non-cloned theme file so my changes are not seen.
Because if I open the newly created page and go to settings  --> advanced --> edit theme, it opens the non-cloned theme, which of course is not editable
that's why i want to delete the original theme after cloning

Hello!
I am trying to simply add a menu and despite of selecting `horizontal` orientation, it is showing as `vertical` . It is a custom menu that I have edited in the `settings` website. However, if I select a `default` menu, that one shows in horizontal correctly. Can anyone shed some light on this? Thanks!

Hello!
I am trying to create horizontal menu with icons. But I am confuse how to create. Need help.
Hi <@UJNT83K7A> - here's how you can create a Website Navigation, but not sure if you can add Icons to it.
Okay. Thank you so much.
:v::skin-tone-3:
It's working. I added font awesome icons in the menu and it's working. Thanks

Awesome!
Please share a screenshot here. Maybe, I can also make use of icons sometime. :smiley:
Sure
I did not add any link to those icons yet. But we can add.

Can you please share:
1. How did you change the font
2. How does it look in real - I mean the icons in preview mode.
Thanks!
I am using font awesome CSS for the icons.
Looks good!
